description:
A cozy studio on the Bushwick-Bedstuy boarder, perfect for couples or individuals spending the holidays in New York.

One flight of stairs to the apartment, queen-sized bed with a microwave, water-heater and mini-oven.

All areas of the apartment are available to guests, the closet, balcony, and kitchenette.

I will be out of town from December 18th - January 18th, but available via phone to answer questions.

A family neighborhood with a number of cafes and eateries in walking distance.

The J train is a 5 minute walk from the apartment, and the L train is a 15 minute walk.
name: Bushwick-Bedstuy Studio
